original_title: Gente que no sabe lo que quiere
overview: In a world where the LGBT community is not a minority, we seek in to three stories about a group of undecided friends. Marina and Lia are together, Sergio and Pablo too and they want to have kids together but they don't quite know how to start. On the other hand, David has to tell his friends that he thinks he's straight but they don't know how to respond to that. And finally, Laura and Carla have to find out if they like their friend Irene, while she's very sure about that.
title: People with Mixed Feelings
